# Data Analysis

## R Code Example

Standard R code blocks:

````markdown
```{{r}}
#| echo: true
set.seed(42)
x <- rnorm(100)
...
```
````

```{r}
#| echo: true

set.seed(42)
x <- rnorm(100)
y <- 2 * x + rnorm(100, sd = 0.5)
summary(lm(y ~ x))
```

## Code with Column Output {.small-slide}

Use `#| output-location: column` to place output side-by-side.

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| output-location: column

df <- data.frame(
  Treatment = rep(c("A", "B", "C"), each = 4),
  Response = c(23, 25, 21, 24, 30, 32, 28, 31, 18, 20, 17, 19)
)
df |> knitr::kable()
```

### Full Regression Output

```{r}
#| echo: true

set.seed(42)
n <- 200
x1 <- rnorm(n)
x2 <- rnorm(n)
x3 <- rnorm(n)
y <- 3 + 2*x1 - 1.5*x2 + 0.8*x3 + rnorm(n)
fit <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2 + x3)
summary(fit)
confint(fit)
```
